title: The Fiend
content:
Terrain, attacking and Smothering creatures within.

6m 18m STR Save Concentration

2d8 Fire (Conditional)+2d8 Cold (Conditional)

Wreathe your body in flames that shed light in a 3m radius, provide Resistance to Fire or Cold damage, and retaliate against melee attacks.

GREATER INVISIBILITY

Turn a creature Invisible. Attacks against it have Disadvantage. It attacks with Advantage.

Melee Concentration

Create a blazing wall of fire, burning anyone who dares stand too close.

18m DEX Save Conc
